settings.title: Recycle Your Pre-Loved Dudleys for Something New

settings.text:
Celebrate Earth Month—and our commitment to eco-conscious style—by trading your loved Dudleys toward something new. 

Just send in your pre-worn DS piece and we’ll gift you $25 toward your next order of $100 or more. Shipping is on us.

A win for the planet—and your responsible style.

1. Checkout with DS Renew in your cart, just as you would with a regular purchase. 

2. Complete a DS Renew return for a label to send in your piece. You won’t be charged for anything along the way.

3. Within thirty days, 250 Pineapple Points will be added to your Dudley Devoted account for each piece recycled. That’s $25 towards your next order of $100 or more.

We’re taking our commitment to eco-friendliness even further, offering customers the chance to conveniently recycle well-loved Dudley Stephens products. Better yet: When you choose to recycle your #dsgoods with us, we’ll give you $25 in Pineapple Points toward your next new Dudley. A win for our planet—and your responsible style.

settings.title: What happens next?
settings.text: Once we receive your products, materials are separated by type, then shredded and recycled into raw material. The kinds of materials we use in our products are then used as filler for products such as sports equipment, furniture and pet bedding.

settings.title: When will I see my points for DS Renew in my account? How long do I have to use them?
settings.text: Please allow 30 days for your points to reach your account. You will have 1 year from the day the points are awarded to apply them to a purchase.

settings.title: Do I need my order number for the items I would like to recycle?
settings.text: You do not need your order number for the items you are recycling. As long as your items are Dudley Stephens pieces—even if gifted or purchased from retail partners—we can recycle them. No receipt is necessary.

settings.title: How can I recycle my items? How many can I recycle at once?
settings.text: In order to get your DS Renew shipping label, add the number of Dudley Stephens ‘DS Renew’ items you’d like to recycle to your cart. (Note: If recycling more than 5 pieces at a time, please place multiple orders with a maximum number of 5 pieces per order). Continue checking out with your number of recycled items, which will create a free order. Once the order confirmation is sent to your email, visit our returns site and enter your order number and shipping zip code. From here, follow the instructions to get your shipping label (either emailed label, or a QR code) to send back your item to us using your own packaging. Once your items are sent back to us, your items will be recycled and points will be added to your account at the end of the month.

settings.title: Can I recycle a non-fleece Dudley Stephens item like Repreve® or Luxe Stretch?
settings.text: Yes, we accept any Dudley Stephens item for our recycling program.

settings.title: Will your Dudley Devoted points program change?
settings.text: Our Dudley Devoted rewards program is always subject to change. All terms of the program are available on the FAQ page of our website.

settings.title: What happens to my products after I send them in?
settings.text: Once we receive your items back, your products go to our recycling partner where they will be separated by fabric and recycled into raw materials, to be used as filler in items like sports equipment, furniture, pet bedding and more.

settings.title: Can I get my items back after I have sent them to be recycled?
settings.text: You cannot get back your items once they have been recycled.

settings.title: What can I use my Pineapple Points on?
settings.text:
You can use your Pineapple Points Points on any item at dudley-stephens.com as long as it meets the following criteria:

  • Minimum purchase of $100 or more for each 250 reward, or $25 off your purchase
  • Pineapple Points are not combinable with other promotions or discount codes
  • Pineapple Points are valid for 1 year only after date earned

For more information, visit our Rewards Page

settings.title: How do I get my return label?
settings.text: After following the steps at our returns portal, your return label will be issued via email.

settings.title: Can I send back my DS Renew items for recycling with my most recent DS order for a refund?
settings.text: Please return your DS Renew items separately. Any returns or exchanges of full-priced, unworn merchandise should be returned using a separate shipping label and shipped in a separate package.

settings.title: Do I have to pay for my DS Renew return?
settings.text: Your return for all DS Renew items for recycling will not be subject to our returns processing fee.

settings.title: Can I drop off my DS Renew pieces to your Townhouse headquarters in Connecticut?
settings.text: At this time, we are only accepting returns of DS Renew recycling items via USPS to our warehouse.
